## SmartContract.methods property

This object contains a function for each endpoint defined by the contract. (a bit similar to web3js's "contract.methods").

This is an alternative to . Unlike , automatic type inference (wrt. ABI) is applied when using .

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly methods: {
        [key: string]: (args?: any[]) => Interaction;
    };
```
